Usage¶

To use chatter in a project, add it to your INSTALLED_APPS:

INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...
    'chatter.apps.chatter',
    ...
)

Add chatter’s URL patterns:

from chatter import urls as chatter_urls


urlpatterns = [
    ...
    url(r'^', include(chatter_urls)),
    ...
]
